Name: (via2.X.1)
Description: Via2 connects met2 to met3 in the SKY130T*/SKY130P*/SP8Q/SP8P* flow and met2/capm to met3 in the SKY130DI* flow.

Description: Three sizes of square Vias allowed inside areaid:mt: 0.280um, 1.2 um and 1.5 um

Name: (via2.1f)
